divs: sighting detailsi was opening the back door for my dad so he could put some meat out side when he said can u see that bright light then i just said we have found a ufo. it was a circle bright orange with a kind of headlight or scanner moving infront of it moving just in front of it. i was feeling amazed whan i sor it because it was my first ufo. well i went inside to get my mum, grandad and florie and they said no it's ok so i went back to see it and my sister came along but when i first sor it it going this way \ up that way but when i went to it the 2nd time it was moving this way -. but also when i first sor it was going past 2 bright stars when i sor it the second time the two bright stars had gone just vanished.
